statements: TRUNCATE TABLE smart_contracts; TRUNCATE TABLE transaction_audit, dispute_resolution;
TRUNCATE TABLE transactions, transaction_history, disputes, dispute_resolution RESTART IDENTITY;
TRUNCATE TABLE disputes, transaction_history, transactions, dispute_resolution RESTART IDENTITY;
TRUNCATE TABLE transactions, users, disputes, resolution, audit_logs;
TRUNCATE TABLE users, audit_logs, disputes, transactions, resolution;
